title: High-Quality Datasets for Speech AI Models - TTS ASR
description: Studio-quality text-to-speech datasets with diverse emotions and styles, professionally recorded and validated by expert linguists for AI/ML model training.
raw_markdown:
![Gradscaler](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/logo2-BA-nfG-c.png)Buy Awesome Data
HomeExplore DatasetsOur ToolsBe Data PartnerOur StoryBuy Voices
# Discover the Rich Tapestry of Datasets
Our datasets are precisely captured in state-of-the-art studios worldwide, offering 1500 hours of curated recordings to empower TTS models with exceptional fine-tuning precision.
Explore Datasets
![High-Quality Datasets for AI and Predictive Analytics](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/parrot-cropped-CXAIgxVm.svg)
Our Features
## Why Choose Datasetsmith.com?
Our high-quality datasets and data annotation services are crafted with precision to ensure accuracy and easy integration for businesses looking to advance their AI models.
# High Quality Data
Our datasets are recorded in SOTA Studio facilities, delivering clean, structured, and high-quality audio for advanced AI models and analytics. With professional voice actors across diverse language accents and dialects, each dataset includes annotated non-verbal sounds, and tagged emotions and speaking styles bringing unmatched precision, depth, and linguistic diversity to your finetuning pipeline.
# Indic Languages
We provide datasets in many Indic languages, enabling you to build AI solutions for diverse linguistic needs. Our resources support the creation of inclusive technology that effectively serves multilingual communities.
# Highly Accurate Data
Our speech recognition datasets are optimized for high accuracy, ensuring exceptionally low Word Error Rate (WER), Character Error Rate (CER), Sentence Error Rate (SER), and Diarization Error Rate (DER) all less than 1.99%. Ideal for building robust voice enabled applications.
Data-Annotation Services
## On-Prem Annotation Services
Our on-premise annotation ensures top data security while capturing non-verbal sounds, emotions, cues, translation and transliteration. With humans-in-the-loop and expert 3-stage validation, we deliver 100% accurate, prosody-rich datasets. Need DaaS or AaaS? We've got both built for unbeatable AI.
### Our Specialized Services
  * Data Correction
  * Data Tagging
  * Conversational Data Tagging
  * Synthetic Data Validation
  * Data Scaling


### Quality Metrics
Word Error Rate (WER)
Less than 3% WER
Model Accuracy Improvement
Up to 5% improvement
## Quality Metrics & Performance
#### Word Error Rate (WER)
<3%
Industry-leading accuracy in speech recognition
#### Model Accuracy Improvement
+5%
Average improvement in model performance
#### CER
<1.99%
Character Error Rate
#### DER
<1.99%
Diarization Error Rate
#### Validation
3-Stage
Quality Assurance
Our multi-layered approach guarantees high-quality, reliable data, enhancing model performance. Using our services, our clients have successfully improved their model accuracy by up to 5%. Our datasets maintain a WER of less than 3%.
## Trusted by Industry Leaders
![Cartesia](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/cartesia-Bau8WHMd.png)
![Observe.ai](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/prahas-Cl8ezIn0.png)
![DesiVocal](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/DesiVocal-D84pjwW-.png)
![Resemble.ai](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/resemble.ai-Bw1BHrfF.webp)
![DubDub](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/dubdub-CZ2XUlX6.png)
Interested in learning more about Datasetsmith? Let's connect and discuss how we can tailor them to your needs.
Schedule Meeting
![Company Logo](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/logo2-BA-nfG-c.png)
Empowering data-driven decisions through innovative solutions and expert guidance.
![ISO Certification](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/iso-mQmCdSrx.png)![GDPR Compliance](https://datasetsmith.com/assets/gdpr-BYfkvzBN.png)
